channel.title: Npc dialouge troubles

item.title: Npc dialouge troubles
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Hey guys, im trying to make an npc speak.

This is what ive added so far.

if(NPCID ==922 ){ skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 175; }

In my case 155. Does this need to go anywhere specific in there, or just with the rest of it.

Also ive added.

case 175: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Hallloo", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Do i perhaps need to add the npcs Id , somewhere in the one above?Im not sure. Ive added the one above in
public void UpdateNPCChat() {

Cheers guys.

Read full topic
